section.title: About Me
section.content: I am a Web Application Developer with a passion for developing modern and latest programs that contribute to the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success. I have a strong background in Web Development, Programming and Computer Networking.

section.title: Back-end Development
section.content: I have experience in Back-end Development using various Frameworks. I can create robust Server-Side Applications, manage Databases, and implement APIs to ensure seamless communication between the Front-end and Back-end.

section.title: Front-end Development
section.content: I have a solid understanding of Front-end technologies and can create responsive and user-friendly interfaces. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I can work with frameworks like React and Vue.js to build dynamic Web Applications.

section.title: Landing Page Development
section.content: I can design and develop Landing Pages that are visually appealing and optimized for conversions. I focus on creating engaging user experiences that effectively communicate the brand's message and drive user action.

section.title: Desktop Application Development
section.content: I have experience in developing Desktop Applications using languages like Java and C#. I can create Cross-Platform Applications that provide a seamless user experience across different Operating Systems.

experience.title: Desktop Application Developer
experience.description: Developing a booking and check-in system for ADC Hotel and Resort to manage guests data and reservation as a capstone project.

experience.title: Network Administrator Assistant
experience.description: Assisting a Network Administrator in managing and maintaining the college's network infrastructure, troubleshooting computer issues and cleaning a computer labs as a OJT student.

projects.title: Background Remover
projects.description: Easily remove backgrounds from your photos and images with our powerful and intuitive tool. Perfect for e-commerce, social media, and more!

projects.title: Timeny
projects.description: Know your remaining life according to average life expectancy of human and discover more info about your birthday.

projects.title: Green Jobs
projects.description: Browse or post an environmental jobs that you can work, fulltime or partime to contribute to save the mother earth.

projects.title: IP Info
projects.description: A web application that provides information about your IP address, including geolocation.
